name: BallMad
description:
Game

BallMad Game is a multiplayer game that supports up to four players on the same device. The objective of the game is to collect diamonds and hit ars to increase the player's score. The game is made by Muhammad Ali in one night. The cheat code to activate cheats in the game is by pressing the left shift key, left control key, and C key simultaneously. The game is a fun and challenging experience for players and is sure to keep them entertained for hours.

To get score, you hit the bars on the screen. Different colors give different scores:

  • The green one gives 10 points
  • The red one gives 20 points
  • The blue one gives 50 points
  • The yellow one gives 100 points
  • The diamond gives 1000 points
  • Spikes take 100 points
Credits

Made by Muhammad Ali

Published by Alimad Interactive Entertainment
